member.name: T:VectSharp.Markdown.HTTPUtils
member.summary: Contains utilities to resolve absolute and relative URIs.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.HTTPUtils.LogDownloads
member.summary: Determines whether every file that is downloaded should be logged to the standard error stream.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Markdown.HTTPUtils.ResolveImageURI(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Resolves an image Uri, by downloading the image file if necessary. It also takes care of ensuring that the file extension matches the format of the file.
member.param: The base uri to use for relative uris.
member.returns: A tuple containing the local path of the image file (either the original image, or a local copy of a remote file) and a boolean value indicating whether the image was fetched from a remote location and should be deleted after the program is done with it.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer
member.summary: Renders Markdown documents into VectSharp graphics objects.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BaseFontSize
member.summary: The base font size to use when rendering the document. This will be the size of regular elements, and the size of header elements will be expressed as a multiple of this.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.MathFontScalingFactor
member.summary: Scaling factor for the font size to use when rendering math.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.HeaderFontSizeMultipliers
member.summary: The font size for elements at each header level. The values in this array will be multiplied by the .

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.HeaderLineThicknesses
member.summary: The thickness of the separator line after a header of each level. A value of 0 disables the line after headers of that level.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ThematicBreakThickness
member.summary: The thickness of thematic break lines.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.RegularFontFamily
member.summary: The font family for regular text.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BoldFontFamily
member.summary: The font family for bold text.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ItalicFontFamily
member.summary: The font family for italic text.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BoldItalicFontFamily
member.summary: The font family for bold italic text.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeFont
member.summary: The font family for code elements.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeFontBold
member.summary: The font family for bold code elements.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeFontItalic
member.summary: The font family for italic code elements.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeFontBoldItalic
member.summary: The font family for bold italic code elements.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.UnderlineThickness
member.summary: The thickness of underlines. This value will be multiplied by the font size of the element being underlined.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BoldUnderlineThickness
member.summary: The thickness of underlines for bold text. This value will be multiplied by the font size of the element being underlined.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.Margins
member.summary: The margins of the page.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TableCellMargins
member.summary: The margins for table cells.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.VerticalAlignment
member.summary: Defines the options for the vertical alignment of table cells.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.VerticalAlignment.Top
member.summary: Table cells will be aligned at the top of their row.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.VerticalAlignment.Middle
member.summary: Table cells will be aligned in the middle of their row.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.VerticalAlignment.Bottom
member.summary: Table cells will be aligned at the bottom of their row.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TableVAlign
member.summary: The vertical alignment of table cells.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.PageSize
member.summary: The size of the page.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SpaceBeforeParagaph
member.summary: The space before each text paragraph. This value will be multiplied by the .

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SpaceAfterParagraph
member.summary: The space after each text paragraph. This value will be multiplied by the .

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SpaceAfterLine
member.summary: The space after each line of text. This value will be multiplied by the .

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SpaceBeforeHeading
member.summary: The space before each heading. This value will be multiplied by the font size of the heading.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SpaceAfterHeading
member.summary: The space after each heading. This value will be multiplied by the font size of the heading.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeInlineMargin
member.summary: The margin at the left and right of code inlines. This value will be multiplied by the current font size.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.IndentWidth
member.summary: The indentation width used for list items.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.QuoteBlockIndentWidth
member.summary: The indentation width used for block quotes.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.QuoteBlockBarWidth
member.summary: The thickness of the bar to the left of block quotes.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SubSuperscriptFontSize
member.summary: The font size for subscripts and superscripts. This value will be multiplied by the current font size.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SuperscriptShift
member.summary: The upwards shift in the baseline for superscript elements. This value will be multiplied by the current font size.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SubscriptShift
member.summary: The downwards shift in the baseline for subscript elements. This value will be multiplied by the current font size.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BaseImageUri
member.summary: The base uri for resolving relative image addresses.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ImageUriResolver
member.summary: A method used to resolve (possibly remote) image uris into local file paths. The first argument of the method should be the image uri and the second argument the base uri used to resolve relative links. The method should return a tuple containing the path of the local file and a boolean value indicating whether the file has been fetched from a remote location and should be deleted after the program has finished using it.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BaseLinkUri
member.summary: The base uri for resolving links.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.LinkUriResolver
member.summary: A method used to resolve link addresses. The argument of the method should be the absolute link, and the method should return the resolved address. This can be used to "redirect" links to a different target.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.RasterImageLoader
member.summary: A method used to a load raster image from a local file. The argument of the method should be the path of a local image file, and the method should return a RasterImage representing that file. For example, this can be achieved using the RasterImageFile class from the VectSharp.MuPDFUtils package. If this is , only SVG images will be included in the document.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ImageUnitMultiplier
member.summary: The size of images (as defined in the image's width and height attributes) will be multiplied by this value to determine the actual size of the image on the page. This has no effect on images without a width or height attribute.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ImageMultiplier
member.summary: The size of images will be multiplied by this value to determine the actual size of the image on the page. For images that have a width or height attribute, this will be applied in addition to the . For images without width and height, only this multiplier will be applied.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ImageSideMargin
member.summary: The margin on the right of left-aligned images and on the left of right-aligned images.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ImageMarginTolerance
member.summary: Images will be allowed to extend into the page bottom margin area by this amount before triggering a page break. This should be smaller than the bottom margin, otherwise images risk being cut off by the page boundary.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.SyntaxHighlighter
member.summary: A method used for syntax highlighting. The first argument should be the source code to highlight, while the second parameter is the name of the language to use for the highlight. The method should return a list of lists of s, with each list of s representing a line. For each code block, if the method returns , no syntax highlighting is used.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.Bullets
member.summary: Bullet points used for unordered lists. Each element of this list corresponds to the bullet for each level of list indentation. If the list indentation is greater than the number of elements in this list, the bullet points will be reused cyclically. Each element of this list is a method taking two arguments: the first is the object on which the bullet point should be drawn, while the second is the colour in which it should be painted. The method should draw the bullet point centered around the origin. The size of the bullet point will be multiplied by the current font size.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ForegroundColour
member.summary: The foreground colour for text elements.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.BackgroundColour
member.summary: The background colour for the page.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.HeaderLineColour
member.summary: The colour of the line below headers.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.ThematicBreakLineColour
member.summary: The colour for thematic break lines.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.LinkColour
member.summary: The colour for hypertext links-

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeInlineBackgroundColour
member.summary: The background colour for code inlines.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.CodeBlockBackgroundColour
member.summary: The background colour for code blocks.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.QuoteBlockBarColour
member.summary: The colour for the bar to the left of block quotes.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.QuoteBlockBackgroundColour
member.summary: The background colour for block quotes.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.InsertedColour
member.summary: The colour for text that has been styled as "inserted".

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.MarkedColour
member.summary: The colour for text that has been styled as "marked".

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TableHeaderRowSeparatorColour
member.summary: The colour for the line separating the table header row from normal rows.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TableRowSeparatorColour
member.summary: The colour for lines separating table rows from each other.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TableHeaderRowSeparatorThickness
member.summary: The thickness of the line separating the table header row from normal rows.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TableHeaderSeparatorThickness
member.summary: The thickness of lines separating table rows from each other.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TaskListUncheckedBullet
member.summary: The bullet used for unchecked task list items.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.TaskListCheckedBullet
member.summary: The bullet used for checked task list items.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.AllowPageBreak
member.summary: Determines whether page breaks should be treated as such in the source.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.RenderSinglePage(System.String,System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Parses the supplied using all the supported extensions and renders the resulting document. Page breaks are disabled, and the document is rendered as a single page with the specified . The page will be cropped at the appropriate height to contain the entire document.
member.param: When this method returns, this value will contain a dictionary used to associate graphic action tags to hyperlinks. This can be used to enable such links when rendering the to a file.
member.returns: A containing a rendering of the supplied markdown document.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.RenderSinglePage(Markdig.Syntax.MarkdownDocument,System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Renders the supplied . Page breaks are disabled, and the document is rendered as a single page with the specified . The page will be cropped at the appropriate height to contain the entire document.
member.param: When this method returns, this value will contain a dictionary used to associate graphic action tags to hyperlinks. This can be used to enable such links when rendering the to a file.
member.returns: A containing a rendering of the supplied markdown document.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.Render(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Parses the supplied using all the supported extensions and renders the resulting document. The produced consists of one or more pages of the size specified in the of the current instance.
member.param: When this method returns, this value will contain a dictionary used to associate graphic action tags to hyperlinks. This can be used to enable such links when rendering the to a file.
member.returns: A containing a rendering of the supplied markdown document, consisting of one or more pages of the size specified in the of the current instance.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Markdown.MarkdownRenderer.Render(Markdig.Syntax.MarkdownDocument,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Renders the supplied . The produced consists of one or more pages of the size specified in the of the current instance.
member.param: When this method returns, this value will contain a dictionary used to associate graphic action tags to hyperlinks. This can be used to enable such links when rendering the to a file.
member.returns: A containing a rendering of the supplied markdown document, consisting of one or more pages of the size specified in the of the current instance.

member.summary: Contains methods to perform syntax highlighting.

member.summary: Performs syntax highlighting for a specified language on some source code.
member.param: The source code to be highlighted.
The name of the language to use for the highlighting.
member.returns: A list of lists of s. Each list of s represents a line.
